ENGLISH: Building province selectors will force people to move out of the province towards provinces with an immigrator. Decisions can be used to manipulate whether accepted pops or non-accepted pops will move, and whether to colonial or non-colonial provinces. Beware though: When province selectors are active, the population will quickly grow rebellious, and the economy in expulsion regions will come to a grinding halt.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move accepted pops.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move non-accepted pops.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move pops to non-colonial provinces.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move pops to colonial provinces.
Direct Immigration: Move Pops to Colonies
Select the options that you want for immigration!
